page.title: 10School Life: Hadleigh
page.content: We have to be at school for 9.00a.m. When the bell goes we line up in classes.The duty teacher comes and tells us to go in and put our coat and bag in the cloakroom.We go in the class room where the teacher takes the regis- ter.Usually we go in to assembly where the Headmaster or Deputy (Mr.Woods and Mr.Garland)talk to us.We sing a song and go back to the classroom for less- ons until 10.35a.m. We go out for play until 10.55a.m. then we continue less- ons until 12.00noon then it's dinner play. When the bell goes at 1.15p.m. we go in and read for twenty minutes and then we continue until 3.00p.m. when the teacher sometimes reads to us until twenty past three when it is home time.
